evaluation.experiment

Class Experiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • evaluation.experiment.Experiment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompareExperiment, Optimization

    public abstract class Experiment
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represents an experiment. By implementing the method "getDatasets()" you can specify on which datasets the experiment can be run. In the "runExperiment(...)" you can implement the logic of the experiment. Nearly everything can be implemented in this method.
    Author:
    MK

      abstract DatasetType[] getDatasets()
      Returns the dataset-types which can be used for this experiment.
      abstract void runExperiment(Dataset dataset)
      Starts the experiment with the given dataset.
